hero.title: Warcraft Stats
hero.description: Track all the latest stats and updates, and gain meaningful insights into the next expansion of World of Warcraft - The War Within.

features.title: Mythic Plus
features.description: View mythic plus class distribution for The War Within expansion.

features.title: Overall
features.description: View raid statistics for all bosses in Nerub'ar Palace in The War Within expansion.

features.title: Cooldowns
features.description: Extract healer cooldowns for all bosses in Nerub'ar Palace in The War Within expansion using a warcraftlog report.
